languages.text: "К тому же Миссия Касбаллики — а я имею право заявлять такое — видит в Вашей Светлости ценн{mf|ого|ую} и проверенн{mf|ого|ую} союзни{mf|ка|цу}".
"Besides, the Kasballica Mission — and I'm authorised to say this — sees Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship as a proven and valuable ally."
languages.original_text: "К тому же Миссия Касбаллики — а я имею право заявлять такое — видит в Вашей Светлости ценн{mf|ого|ую} и проверенн{mf|ого|ую} союзни{mf|ка|цу}".

traits.locale_text: "Besides, the Kasballica Mission — and I'm authorised to say this — sees Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship as a proven and valuable ally."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Besides, the Kasballica Mission — and I'm authorised to say this — sees Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship as a proven and valuable ally."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Besides, the Kasballica Mission — and I'm authorised to say this — sees Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship as a proven and valuable ally."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Besides, the Kasballica Mission — and I'm authorised to say this — sees Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship as a proven and valuable ally."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “而且我有权这么说，卡斯巴利卡集团此外一直将您视为久经考验的重要盟友，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Besides, the Kasballica Mission — and I'm authorised to say this — sees Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship as a proven and valuable ally."

traits.locale_text: “而且我有权这么说，卡斯巴利卡集团此外一直将您视为久经考验的重要盟友，大人。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「それに、私にはこれを言う権限があるんだが、カスバリカ聖務団は陛下を重要な味方として信頼している」
languages.original_text: "Besides, the Kasballica Mission — and I'm authorised to say this — sees Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship as a proven and valuable ally."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、私にはこれを言う権限があるんだが、カスバリカ聖務団は陛下を重要な味方として信頼している」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Además, la Misión Kasballica, y estoy autorizado a decirlo, ve a mi{mf|lord|lady} como un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a} valios{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "Besides, the Kasballica Mission — and I'm authorised to say this — sees Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship as a proven and valuable ally."

traits.locale_text: «Además, la Misión Kasballica, y estoy autorizado a decirlo, ve a mi{mf|lord|lady} como un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a} valios{mf|o|a}».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Zudem sieht die Kasballica-Mission — und ich bin befugt, das zu sagen — Euer {mf|Lordschaft als bewährten und wertvollen Verbündeten|Ladyschaft als bewährte und wertvolle Verbündete}."
languages.original_text: "Besides, the Kasballica Mission — and I'm authorised to say this — sees Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship as a proven and valuable ally."

traits.locale_text: "Zudem sieht die Kasballica-Mission — und ich bin befugt, das zu sagen — Euer {mf|Lordschaft als bewährten und wertvollen Verbündeten|Ladyschaft als bewährte und wertvolle Verbündete}."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Du reste, j'ai l'autorisation de vous dire que la Mission de la Kasballica vous considère comme {mf|un allié aussi précieux|une alliée aussi précieuse} que fiable. »
languages.original_text: "Besides, the Kasballica Mission — and I'm authorised to say this — sees Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship as a proven and valuable ally."

traits.locale_text: « Du reste, j'ai l'autorisation de vous dire que la Mission de la Kasballica vous considère comme {mf|un allié aussi précieux|une alliée aussi précieuse} que fiable. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Hem Kasballica Misyonu... Yetkime dayanarak söylüyorum, zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni güvenilir ve değerli bir müttefik saymakta."
languages.original_text: "Besides, the Kasballica Mission — and I'm authorised to say this — sees Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship as a proven and valuable ally."

traits.locale_text: "Hem Kasballica Misyonu... yetkime dayanarak söylüyorum, zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni güvenilir ve değerli bir müttefik saymakta."
